jsonData.summary: The Washington Wizards defeated the Los Angeles Lakers, 111-95, at Capital One Arena on Thursday evening. Both teams came out with the hot hand, as evidenced by the 37-34 score in favor of the Wizards (6-5) at the end of the first quarter. However, Washington used a strong second period to create some distance from the Lakers (5-7) , who may have been feeling some of the effects of an East Coast back-to-back set. The home squad was able to keep Los Angeles at bay throughout the second half, utilizing some aggressive defense that led to a total of 19 turnovers on the part of the visitors, along with a pedestrian 36 percent success rate from the field (including 13 percent from three-point range) . The Lakers were able to get seven players into double figures in the scoring column, but none tallied more than 15 points. Brook Lopez and Jordan Clarkson both produced that total from the starting five and bench, respectively. Lopez added four rebounds, two blocks and one steal, while Clarkson supplied two rebounds. Kyle Kuzma and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope produced matching 13-point tallies, with the former adding nine rebounds and one assist and the latter registering four rebounds, three assists and three steals. Julius Randle turned in a near double-double off the bench with 11 points, nine rebounds, one assist and one steal. Brandon Ingram contributed 10 points, four rebounds and one assist. Lonzo Ball matched his point total but his shooting woes continued, as he drained only three of 12 from the field. He did add eight rebounds, eight assists and two steals. John Wall paced the Wizards with 23 points, eight rebounds, five assists, three blocks and two steals. Backcourt mate Bradley Beal followed closely behind with 22 points, five rebounds, five assists and one steal. Otto Porter, Jr. turned in a 20-point, 11-rebound double-double that also included two assists and one steal. Markieff Morris compiled 16 points, five rebounds and one assist over 17 minutes in his best outing of the season. Marcin Gortat managed eight points, five rebounds and one assist. The Lakers continue on to Milwaukee to face the Bucks on Saturday night, while the Wizards remain home and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday evening as well.

templates.value:
[[DefeatSentence(WinningTeam,LosingTeam,WholeJSON.location.stadium,WholeJSON.date.dayname)// Note ties not possible in NBA
]] [[StrongPeriodSentence(WinningTeam,LosingTeam)]] [[StrongReboundSentence(WinningTeam,LosingTeam)]] [[LedbySentence(LosingTeam)]] [[LedbySentence(WinningTeam)]] [[Defence(WinningTeam,LosingTeam)]] [[Points(WinningTeam)]] [[PlayerTopScore(LosingTeam)]] [[PlayerTopScore(WinningTeam)]]

#value TeamReference(team)[[

// return a referring expression for a Team, eg   Washington, the Wizards, the Washington Wizards

// Global variable ReferenceTeams is a list of all teams referenced so far in the narrative.

// Initially it is empty, teams are added to it when this function is called

present=contains(ReferencedTeams, team)

global.ReferencedTeams = concat(ReferencedTeams, team)

if (present) [[chooseAtRandom(team.team_place,"the [[team.team_name]]")]] else [["the [[team.team_place]] [[team.team_name]]"]]

]]

#value StrongPeriod(team,other) [[

// identify a strong period (diff in pts >= 10).

if (team.statistics.team.period["1"]["pts"] - other.statistics.team.period["1"]["pts"] >= 10) [["first"]]

elseif (team.statistics.team.period["2"]["pts"] - other.statistics.team.period["2"]["pts"] >= 10) [["second"]]

elseif (team.statistics.team.period["3"]["pts"] - other.statistics.team.period["3"]["pts"] >= 10) [["third"]]

elseif (team.statistics.team.period["4"]["pts"] - other.statistics.team.period["4"]["pts"] >= 10) [["fourth"]]

else [[""]]

]]

#value StrongPeriodSentence(team,other)[[

// sentence such as  Washington had a strong second quarter.

if (StrongPeriod(team,other)!="") [["[[TeamReference(team)]] had a [[chooseAtRandom("strong", "powerful")]] [[StrongPeriod(team,other)]] quarter."]] else [[""]]

]]

#value TeamReferenceNoCity(team)[[

// Variant of TeamReference which does not use "city ref".  Eg  the Wizards   OR  the Washington Wizards   BUT NOT   Washington

// Students should normally use TeamReference, but TeamReferenceNoCity maybe useful in a few contexts

present=contains(ReferencedTeams, team)

global.ReferencedTeams = concat(ReferencedTeams, team)

if (present) [["The [[team.team_name]]"]] else [["The [[team.team_place]] [[team.team_name]]"]]

]]

#value StrongReboundSentence(winner,loser) [[

// generate a sentence about strong rebounding if diff between teams is greater than 10

if (winner.statistics.team.game.reb > loser.statistics.team.game.reb + 10)

    {[[StrongReboundPhrase(winner,loser)]]}

elseif (loser.statistics.team.game.reb > winner.statistics.team.game.reb + 10)

    {[[StrongReboundPhrase(loser,winner)]]}

else

     { }

]]

#value StrongReboundPhrase(teamA,teamB) [[

// generate a sentence such as     The Nuggets outrebounded the Rockets 52-26

"[[TeamReference(teamA)]] out rebounded [[TeamReference(teamB)]] [[teamA.statistics.team.game.reb]]-[[teamB.statistics.team.game.reb]]."

]]

#value DefeatSentence(winner,loser,place,date)[[

// sentence such asThe Washington Wizards defeated the Los Angeles Lakers, 111-95, at Capital One Arena on Thursday evening.

"[[TeamReference(winner)]] defeated [[TeamReference(loser)]], [[winner.statistics.team.game.pts]]-[[loser.statistics.team.game.pts]], at [[place]] on [[date]]."

]]

#value LedbySentence(team) [[

// sentence such as    New York was led by Courtney Lee's 16 points, which he supplemented with three rebounds, three assists and one steal.


sortedPlayers = sort(values(team.statistics.players),(a,b) -> sign(b.pts - a.pts)) 

bestPlayer = sortedPlayers[0]  

"[[TeamReferenceNoCity(team)]] were [[chooseAtRandom("led by", "guided by")]] [[bestPlayer.full_name]]'s with [[PlayerPerformancePhrase(bestPlayer)]] [[forAll(sortedPlayers[1:],x->DoubleDouble(x))]]."


]]

#value PlayerPerformancePhrase(player) [[

// phrase such as    16 points, three rebounds, three assists and one steal

// Logic: create a list of components, and add to it all phrases which are not for 0.  Then user "list" function to put components together into a list

// Use Studio countable function so we correctly get "2 steals" but "1 steal"

components = makeList()

if (player.pts > 0) [[components=concat(components,countable(player.pts, "", "point"))]]   // add points if not 0

if (player.ast > 0) [[components=concat(components,countable(player.ast,"","assist"))]]    // add assists if not 0

if (player.reb > 0) [[components=concat(components,countable(player.reb,"","rebound"))]]    // add rebounds if not 0

if (player.stl > 0) [[components=concat(components,countable(player.stl,"","steal"))]]       // add steals if not 0

if (player.blk > 0) [[components=concat(components,countable(player.blk,"","block"))]]      // add blocks if not 0

list('and',true,'',components)

]]

#value Defence(winner,loser)[[

// sentence 

"[[TeamReference(HomeTeam)]] kept [[TeamReference(loser)]] at bay by [[winner.statistics.team.game.tov]] turnovers with an aggresive defense."          ]]

#value Points(team) [[

// phrase such as    The Lakers were able to get seven players into double figures in the scoring column, but none tallied more than 15 points.

players = values(team.statistics.players)

names = map(filter(players, x -> x.pts > 15 ), player -> player.full_name)

"These are the players that tallied less than 15 points are: [[names]]."

]]

#value PlayerTopScore(team) [[  

sortedPlayers = sort(values(team.statistics.players),(a,b) -> sign(b.pts - a.pts)) 

bestPlayer = sortedPlayers[0]  

"[[TeamReferenceNoCity(team)]] were [[chooseAtRandom("led by", "sterred by")]] the following player [[bestPlayer.full_name]]'s with [[PlayerPerformancePhrase(bestPlayer)]]. These are the top four players with the highest score: [[sortedPlayers[1].full_name]],[[sortedPlayers[2].full_name]], [[sortedPlayers[3].full_name]], [[sortedPlayers[4].full_name]]."


]]

#value DoubleDouble(player) [[

if(player.pts > 9 && player.reb > 9 && player.ast <10 && player.stl <10 && player.blk <10)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts > 9 && player.reb < 10 && player.ast > 9 && player.stl <10 && player.blk <10)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts > 9 && player.reb < 10 && player.ast <10 && player.stl >9 && player.blk < 10)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts > 9 && player.reb < 10 && player.ast <10 && player.stl <10 && player.blk > 9)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts <10 && player.reb > 9 && player.ast > 9 && player.stl <10 && player.blk < 10)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts <10 && player.reb > 9 && player.ast < 10 && player.stl > 9 && player.blk < 10)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts <10 && player.reb > 9 && player.ast < 10 && player.stl < 10 && player.blk > 9)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts < 10 && player.reb < 10 && player.ast > 9 && player.stl > 9 && player.blk > 10)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts < 10 && player.reb < 10 && player.ast > 9 && player.stl < 10 && player.blk > 9)

{ This is Double-double }

elseif(player.pts < 10 && player.reb < 10 && player.ast < 10 && player.stl >9  && player.blk > 9 )

{ This is Double-double }

else{ [[chooseAtRandom("they", "then")]] achieved [[player.pts]] rebounds.}

]]
